# shared()

**Type Method**

Retrieves the shared photo library object.

## Declaration

```swift
class func shared() -> PHPhotoLibrary
```

## Return Value

The singleton photo library object.

## Discussion

You may use the shared photo library object from any thread.
title: shared()
